title: What Tangled Webs
description: A new series of scaries from Dan Dillard, author of Demons and Other Inconveniences. What Tangled Webs includes more stories of the macabre. Includes the novella, "The Wager" where Jacob Kane finds himself living in a hell on Earth. He's lost the woman he loves, his peaceful life, and worst of all, his soul. What has the devil got in store for him? Bounty hunting the worst, most despicable people on the planet.
author: Dan Dillard
